Entries.OneKid_3: I can't believe I'm a "mum"... life is weird.$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: I had a dream that %kid2 will grow up to be a famous monster hunter. I've already been thinking about a little armour set.
Entries.Good_3: I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair... I swear, it never fades from this colour...
Entries.Good_4: I'm glad I owned a heavy pair of boots before moving in. It's hard to imagine tip-toeing around the mud in trainers.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and shrivelled. It's going to happen some day!
Entries.fall_6: Ah... autumn. This might be my favourite time of year. The colours really complement my hair, don't you think?
Entries.fall_1: The scent is unmistakable... mushroom, rotting leaves, pumpkin. It's autumn, alright. Isn't it lovely?
Entries.winter_3: I actually like the cold weather. It just gives me an excuse to get cosy!$h
